alert.note: Alert for Monona (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 05 at 3:50PM CDT until July 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 437 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN IOWA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL IOWA MONONA IN NEBRASKA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL NEBRASKA BURT IN NORTHEAST NEBRASKA ANTELOPE BOONE CEDAR CUMING KNOX MADISON PIERCE STANTON THURSTON WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBION, BLOOMFIELD, COLERIDGE, CREIGHTON, CROFTON, DECATUR, ELGIN, HARTINGTON, LAUREL, LYONS, MACY, MAPLETON, NELIGH, NIOBRARA, NORFOLK, OAKLAND, ONAWA, OSMOND, PENDER, PIERCE, PLAINVIEW, RANDOLPH, ST. EDWARD, STANTON, TEKAMAH, VERDIGRE, WALTHILL, WAUSA, WAYNE, WEST POINT, WINNEBAGO, AND WISNER.
